blog.name: dramaphan
blog.title: Yo I Comment On The Drama When Shit Hits The Fan
blog.description:
Phandom drama? It's more likely than you think.

.

My ask box is always open if you need a place to be dramatic, share theories, conspiracies, opinions, or general grievances. Fire away, my babies. Nothing is off limits. (Except for the things that are.)

.

Icon by phanniephobic, header by cinnamonnutlester

summary: The reason I’m so frustrated with dan personally is that he obviously hasn’t decided to abandon us yet - he said he was going to...
question: The reason I’m so frustrated with dan personally is that he obviously hasn’t decided to abandon us yet - he said he was going to make videos, tweeted that pic about the future, uploaded the picture missing ii, and still gives us generic tweets from his drafts so he’s making the bare minimum effort but he hasn’t given us any idea into the reason why he’s doing the least. Does he want a longer break? Is he not doing well? Is he uninspired? If we knew then we’d be able to wait or move on.
answer:
I kind of feel the same way. Like, just recently when someone asked him if he had ideas for future videos, he just responded with “yes”. But what does that tell us? Okay you have ideas. Do you plan to make them? Like, soon? In another year? Can we have any sort of information? It would just be nice if we had any idea what he’s doing right now. Even if he just said “i plan to make a video soon.” Without any specific timeline, at least we would know he plans to come back at all. Or he could say “I’m gonna make a video someday but don’t wait around for it.” Or “yeah soz done videos bye”

It’s been almost a year. And he’s told us next to nothing about where he is, what he’s doing, what his plans are. Not that we’re entitled to that, but it would just be nice to know, and more professional of him to communicate a bit more substantially with his audience.

summary: ??? They are moving?? Is it a new theory or...?
question: ??? They are moving?? Is it a new theory or...?
answer: I mean… they are definitely gonna move at some point. But also I just love moving speculations. It was so fun last time, I just want to do it again. And the good thing about it is that with a very high probability, eventually, we WILL be right, so it’s a win win.

blog.name: thedemonphanti
blog.title: thedemonphanti
blog.description: Treat People With Respect | Unpopular Opinions Welcome

summary: He didn't do anything I love dan, but I feel that he would be so much happier if he stopped doing youtube. It feels like he is...
question: He didn't do anything I love dan, but I feel that he would be so much happier if he stopped doing youtube. It feels like he is doing it because he ended up being successful making videos, but we've come to a point where nothing he does is about entertaining videos anymore. People obsess about phan and his sexuality and everything he does gets connected to these two things. As a fan this is really tiring and everything he does seems forced. Idk probs don't make much sense.
answer:
I think I get what you are saying (I think). I’m selfish so I don’t want Dan to leave the Internet, but it does seem like we are at this point where there are a whole group of people who will never be happy with anything he does unless he becomes their gay icon and every video he makes that isn’t a “coming out” video is a disappointment to them and gets picked apart. If it’s incredibly frustrating for me as a fan of his, it must be beyond incredibly frustrating to him as a content creator and just as a human being. I do wish people would back off a lot in this regard.

People need to consider this: Even if he is not straight, maybe he just doesn’t want to include you in that aspect of his life. Maybe he doesn’t want to be your gay icon. Not everyone wants to be defined by their sexuality. Maybe he doesn’t want the pressure from you on his real life relationships. Maybe he doesn’t think they are any of your business. There are plenty people out there who do want all that though. Why not support them too and let them have it and let Dan be some guy who makes entertaining videos on YouTube, which we can all just enjoy??
